Meituan's Real-time Intelligent Dispatching Algorithms Build World's Largest Minute-level Delivery Network
美团的实时智能调度算法构建了全球最大的分钟级配送网络

清华大学。, cjf17@mails.tsinghua.edu.cn, j-zheng18@mails.tsinghua.edu.cn, wangling@mail.tsinghua.edu.cn,

Meituan pioneers an on-demand food delivery service in China which allows consumers to place food orders online for instant delivery. With its world’s largest minute-level delivery network and over 5 million active couriers, Metiuan delivers more than 60 million orders every day and has evolved to be one of the most important infrastructures in China. To meet the service commitment and improve couriers’ working experience, it is of great importance for Meituan to continuously optimize the order assignment decisions. Thus it builds a real-time intelligent dispatch system, including a set of algorithms based on operations research and machine learning techniques, to precisely model the assignment problem in a dynamic and uncertain environment, and solve this NP-hard problem in seconds with high quality. Since implementation, the dispatch system has realized a decrease of 20.96 % 20.96 % 20.96%20.96 \% in average order delivery time and 23.77 % 23.77 % 23.77%23.77 \% in average riding distance per order. And it can contribute to about $ 0.23 $ 0.23 $0.23\$ 0.23 billion cost reduction in one year. Moreover, the dispatch system enables the thriving of other new business formats of the digital economy in Meituan, such as Meituan Instashopping and Meituan Grocery.
美团在中国开创了按需即时外卖服务，允许消费者在线下单并进行即时配送。凭借全球最大的按分钟计时配送网络和超过 500 万活跃骑手，美团每天配送超过 6000 万单，已经发展成为中国最重要的基础设施之一。为履行服务承诺并提升骑手的工作体验，美团持续优化订单分配决策至关重要。因此，公司构建了一个实时智能调度系统，该系统包含一套基于运筹学和机器学习技术的算法，能够在动态且不确定的环境中精确建模分配问题，并在数秒内高质量地求解这一 NP 难问题。自实施以来，调度系统实现了平均订单送达时长下降 20.96 % 20.96 % 20.96%20.96 \% 、平均每单骑行距离下降 23.77 % 23.77 % 23.77%23.77 \% 。该系统每年可贡献约 $ 0.23 $ 0.23 $0.23\$ 0.23 亿元的成本节约。此外，调度系统还促进了美团其他数字经济新业态的蓬勃发展，如美团闪购和美团买菜。
Key words: order assignment problem; pick-up and delivery problem; multi-objective problem;
关键词：订单分配问题；取送货问题；多目标问题；

Introduction.  引言。

In recent years, Meituan has been pioneering an on-demand food delivery service in China, covering more than 3,000 cities with over 5 million active couriers, providing over 9.3 million merchants and
近年来，美团在中国率先开展了按需外卖配送服务，覆盖超过 3000 座城市，拥有 500 万以上活跃骑手，为 930 万多家商户提供服务并
687 million consumers with a reliable and fast delivery process. It now occupies the largest share of the Chinese on-demand food delivery market. Its minute-level delivery network has rapidly grown into the largest one globally, delivering over 60 million orders every day, which has evolved to be one of the most important domestic infrastructures. According to the financial report in 2022, the revenue of the core local business of Meituan in the second quarter is $ 5.4 $ 5.4 $5.4\$ 5.4 billion. The net profit for the same period is $ 1.2 $ 1.2 $1.2\$ 1.2 billion.
为 6.87 亿消费者提供了可靠且快速的配送服务。它现在占据了中国即需餐饮外卖市场的最大份额。其分钟级配送网络快速发展成为全球最大的配送网络，每日配送超过 6000 万单，已成为国内最重要的基础设施之一。根据 2022 年财报，美团核心本地业务在第二季度的收入为 $ 5.4 $ 5.4 $5.4\$ 5.4 十亿。同期净利润为 $ 1.2 $ 1.2 $1.2\$ 1.2 十亿。
In this scene, food orders are continuously placed by consumers anywhere. Accordingly, the dispatch system of the delivery platform collects newly-placed orders, pushes them to the corresponding merchants, and then assigns them to the couriers who are responsible for the pick-up and delivery. Meanwhile, a sophisticated equilibrium should be carefully sought during the assignment procedure, to satisfy several key stakeholders involving in the delivery transactions: consumers want reliable and fast service, merchants hope their food served fresh to satisfy their consumers, and couriers pursue to deliver enough orders so as to make a decent wage in a safe and stable environment. The overall procedure of the platform and stakeholders involved in the on-demand food delivery service are shown in Figure 1.
在此场景中，消费者会在任何地点不断地下单。相应地，配送平台的派单系统会收集新下的订单，将其推送给对应的商家，然后将订单分配给负责取餐与派送的配送员。同时，在分配过程中需要谨慎寻求一个复杂的平衡，以满足参与配送交易的若干关键利益相关者：消费者希望得到可靠且快速的服务，商家希望其食物保持新鲜以满足顾客，配送员则追求在安全稳定的环境中配送足够多的订单以获得体面的收入。平台与参与即时外卖服务的利益相关者的整体流程如图 1 所示。
Figure 1: Figure 1 General procedure of on-demand food delivery contains 6 steps with 4 stakeholders (consumer, courier, merchant, platform). 1) consumer places order on the platform, 2) platform pushes the order to the merchant, and the merchant starts to prepare food, 3) platform generates routes for the order's candidate couriers, 4) platform assigns the order to an appropriate courier based on the results of 3), 5) the courier accepts the order and picks up food, 6) the courier delivers food to the consumer.
图 1：图 1 按需外卖的一般流程包含 6 个步骤，涉及 4 类利益相关者（消费者、骑手、商家、平台）。1）消费者在平台下单，2）平台将订单推送给商家，商家开始备餐，3）平台为该订单的候选骑手生成路线，4）平台根据第 3 步的结果将订单分配给合适的骑手，5）骑手接单并取餐，6）骑手将餐品配送给消费者。
In Chinese culture, food is the first and foremost sustenance in people’s lives, and the assignment quality of the dispatch system will greatly impact hundreds of millions of consumers’ experiences. Moreover, the accumulated traveling distance of all the couriers a day can circle the earth for about 1500 rounds. High-quality assignments can effectively shorten couriers’ daily routes while guaranteeing their incomes, thus leading to a significant reduction in carbon emissions. Therefore, how to improve the assignment quality of the dispatch system constitutes a fundamental problem for the delivery platform.
在中国文化中，饮食是人们生活中最重要的生活必需品，调度系统的派单质量会极大影响数以亿计消费者的体验。此外，所有骑手一天累计的行驶距离大约可以绕地球约 1500 圈。高质量的派单在保障骑手收入的同时，可以有效缩短骑手的日常路线，从而显著减少碳排放。因此，如何提升调度系统的派单质量，是外卖平台面临的一个基础性问题。
In response, Meituan addresses the above challenges through technological innovations and developments. It builds a real-time intelligent dispatch system, continuously improving the assignment quality.
为此，美团通过技术创新与发展应对上述挑战。它构建了一个实时智能调度系统，不断提升派单质量。
In the past few years, the dispatch system evolves through three phases. With courier grabbing and dispatcher’s manual assignment as the start point (i.e. phase 0 ), the system enabled automatic assignment in a greedy one-by-one manner, i.e. phase 1 , which soon encountered severe service quality degradation and unacceptable computation time as the rapid growth of order volume. Then the platform upgraded the system into area-level batch assignment mode based on constructive heuristic methods, i.e. phase 2, which met the real-time requirements, however, failed to ensure the assignment quality as the daily order volume increases. Now the system has evolved into phase 3, which realizes citywide global optimal order assignment (OA) via operations research (OR) and machine learning (ML) techniques, serving as the cornerstone to support over 60 million orders every day. Meanwhile, the research and development group grows into a team with 30-40 people.
在过去几年中，派单系统经历了三个阶段的演进。以骑手抢单和调度员手工派单为起点（即第 0 阶段），系统首先实现了贪心式的逐单自动派单（即第 1 阶段），但随着订单量的快速增长，很快遭遇了严重的服务质量下降和不可接受的计算时间。随后平台将系统升级为基于构造性启发式方法的区域级批量派单模式（即第 2 阶段），该模式满足了实时性要求，然而随着日订单量的增加，其派单质量仍难以保障。现在系统已演进到第 3 阶段，通过运筹学（OR）和机器学习（ML）技术实现全市范围的全局最优订单派送（OA），成为支撑每天超过 6000 万单的基石。与此同时，研发团队也发展成为由 30–40 人组成的团队。
Practically, the dispatch procedures are executed every 30 seconds at a city level. At each dispatch period, it takes 3 stages for the dispatch system to generate high-quality OA decisions, i.e., courier behavior estimation, courier candidate evaluation, and OA generation. The former two stages are used for modeling the OA problem, and the last stage develops to obtain a high-quality assignment result. The dispatch procedure is shown in Figure 3.
实际上，调度程序在城市层面上每 30 秒执行一次。在每个调度周期内，调度系统需要经过 3 个阶段来生成高质量的接单分配（OA）决策，即：骑手行为估计、骑手候选评估和 OA 生成。前两个阶段用于对 OA 问题进行建模，最后一个阶段用于获得高质量的分配结果。调度流程如图 3 所示。
Specifically, courier behavior estimation formulates and solves the courier’s pick-up and delivery route planning(RP) problem assuming a new order is assigned, providing the evaluation basis of
具体而言，骑手行为估计在假设分配新订单的情况下，构建并求解骑手的取货与配送路线规划（RP）问题，为……提供评估依据。
Figure 2: Figure 2 Evolution of the dispatch system with order volume increase. 1) Phase 0 : courier grabbing and manual assignment, 2) Phase 1: area-level one-by-one OA based on greedy policy, 3) Phase 2: area-level batch OA based on constructive heuristics, 4) Phase 3: citywide global optimal OA based on OR and ML methods.
图 2：图 2 随订单量增加调度系统的演进。1）阶段 0：骑手抢单与人工分配，2）阶段 1：基于贪心策略的区级逐单 OA，3）阶段 2：基于构造性启发式的区级批量 OA，4）阶段 3：基于运筹学（OR）和机器学习（ML）方法的全市全局最优 OA。
Figure 3: Figure 3 Dispatch procedure implemented every 30 seconds at a city level. 1) courier behavior estimation formulates and solves the courier's RP problem, providing an evaluation basis for the next stage. 2) courier candidate evaluation calculates the matching degree(MD) scores between the new orders and couriers based on the results of 1). 3) OA generation formulates and solves the OA problem to optimize the global MD scores, satisfying each stakeholder.
图 3：图 3 所示为以城市级别每 30 秒执行一次的派单流程。1）骑手行为估计通过建立并求解骑手的 RP 问题，为下一阶段提供评估依据。2）骑手候选评估基于第 1 步的结果计算新订单与骑手之间的匹配度（MD）分数。3）OA 生成通过建立并求解 OA 问题来优化全局 MD 分数，满足各相关方的需求。
the next stage. courier candidate evaluation calculates the MD scores between each new order and its available couriers, reflecting the requirements of each stakeholder. For example, “time score” represents the overtime severity of the order delivered by the courier, and “distance score” represents the total distance increase of the courier caused by the delivery of the order. OA generation focuses on solving the many(order)-to-one(courier) assignment problem to optimize the global MD scores.
下一阶段。骑手候选评估计算每个新订单与其可用骑手之间的 MD 分数，反映各相关方的需求。例如，“时间分数”表示该骑手配送该订单时的超时严重程度，“距离分数”表示该骑手因配送该订单而增加的总距离。OA 生成侧重于解决多（订单）对一（骑手）的分配问题，以优化全局 MD 分数。
The remainder of the paper is organized as follows. In Problem and Challenge section, we describe the assignment problem formulation, properties, and challenges we encounter. In Technical Solution, we introduce our methods at each stage of the dispatch procedure aiming to continuously improve assignment quality. Online A / B A / B A//B\mathrm{A} / \mathrm{B} test and large-scale offline simulation are conducted to validate the effectiveness. In Benefits, the overall effects of the dispatch system are summarized from the view of the key stakeholders, business and finance, environment, as well as the role in response to COVID-19. In the last section, we introduce the extended use of the system at Meituan, and analyze the transportability of our technical solutions proposed in the system.
本文其余部分组织如下。在“问题与挑战”部分，我们描述了派单问题的建模、性质以及所遇到的挑战。在“技术方案”中，我们介绍了派单过程中各阶段的方法，旨在持续提升指派质量。我们通过在线 A / B A / B A//B\mathrm{A} / \mathrm{B} 测试和大规模离线仿真来验证方法的有效性。在“收益”部分，从关键利益相关方、业务与财务、环境以及应对 COVID-19 的作用等角度总结了派单系统的总体效果。在最后一节，我们介绍了该系统在美团的扩展应用，并分析了所提出技术方案的可迁移性。

Problem and Challenge Problem Formulation
问题与挑战 问题表述

In essence, the sequential dispatch process for OA across a day shown in Figure 4 can be formulated as a multi-period multi-objective combinatorial optimization problem, which is defined in (1) of the Appendix. The current dispatch decisions will affect the OA results in the next dispatch period, through changing the courier’s status. Furthermore, the platform pursues global spatial-temporal optimality, i.e., maximum MD scores of all orders and the couriers assigned in a whole day, i.e., { ∑ t = 1 T F t o ∗ } o = 1 O ∑ t = 1 T   F t o ∗ o = 1 O {sum_(t=1)^(T)F_(t)^(o**)}_(o=1)^(O)\left\{\sum_{t=1}^{T} F_{t}^{o *}\right\}_{o=1}^{O}, instead of a single or a few of dispatch periods, i.e., { F t o ∗ } o = 1 O F t o ∗ o = 1 O {F_(t)^(o**)}_(o=1)^(O)\left\{F_{t}^{o *}\right\}_{o=1}^{O}. Explanations for the notations can be found in the Appendix.
本质上，图 4 所示的一天内 OA 的顺序调度过程可以表述为一个多期多目标组合优化问题，其在附录的式（1）中给出。当前的调度决策会通过改变骑手的状态，影响下一调度周期的 OA 结果。此外，平台追求的是全局时空最优性，即全日内所有订单及被分配骑手的最大 MD 得分，即 { ∑ t = 1 T F t o ∗ } o = 1 O ∑ t = 1 T   F t o ∗ o = 1 O {sum_(t=1)^(T)F_(t)^(o**)}_(o=1)^(O)\left\{\sum_{t=1}^{T} F_{t}^{o *}\right\}_{o=1}^{O} ，而不是单个或少数调度周期，即 { F t o ∗ } o = 1 O F t o ∗ o = 1 O {F_(t)^(o**)}_(o=1)^(O)\left\{F_{t}^{o *}\right\}_{o=1}^{O} 。符号说明见附录。

Property and Challenge  性质与挑战

Modeling and solving the above multi-period multi-objective decision problem in an online fashion is no easy task. According to the properties of on-demand food delivery service and OA problems, the technological challenges we encounter are as follows:
以在线方式对上述多期多目标决策问题进行建模与求解并非易事。根据即时配送服务与 OA 问题的特性，我们面临的技术挑战如下：
Dynamic and Sequential Decision Process In our scenario, dispatch is a dynamic and sequential decision process, which executes every 30 seconds in a city level, shown in Figure 4. At each dispatch moment, the system collects the newly arrived orders and the status of available couriers, then decides the best matching of the orders and available couriers. Since the system pursues global spatial-temporal optimality and the matching results of the current moments will
动态与序列决策过程 在我们的场景中，调度是一个动态且序列化的决策过程，在城市层面每 30 秒执行一次，如图 4 所示。在每次调度时刻，系统收集新到的订单和可用配送员的状态，然后决定订单与可用配送员的最佳匹配。由于系统追求时空全局最优，并且当前时刻的匹配结果会
Figure 4: Figure 4 Sequential dispatch process. At each dispatch moment, the dispatch system collects the newly arrived orders and the status of available couriers, then decides the best matching of the orders and available couriers.
图 4：图 4 序列调度过程。在每次调度时刻，调度系统收集新到的订单和可用配送员的状态，然后决定订单与可用配送员的最佳匹配。
directly affect the results afterwards, it is necessary to consider the influence of future information in the succeeding time steps to avoid greedy decisions and achieve long-term global optima.
直接影响之后的结果，因此有必要考虑后续时间步中未来信息的影响，以避免贪婪决策并实现长期全局最优。
However, it is difficult to directly predict the actual influence of the future. On one hand, the exact distributions of orders and courier status in the future are usually stochastic. On the other hand, the behaviors of the couriers and the real-world environment are full of uncertainties, which further complicates the problem. Building a highly-precise simulation system is too expensive and difficult for our scenario.
然而，很难直接预测未来的实际影响。一方面，未来的订单分布和骑手状态的精确分布通常是随机的。另一方面，骑手的行为和现实环境充满不确定性，这使问题更加复杂。为我们的场景构建一个高精度的仿真系统代价太高且困难。
Multi-objective Balance As described above, OA should balance the various goals of different stakeholders. Consumers want to get their food on time and intact, merchants hope their food served fresh to satisfy their consumers, couriers need to deliver enough orders with less labor, the platform pursues to operate the service efficiently.
多目标平衡 如上所述，派单算法应在不同利益相关者的各项目标之间取得平衡。消费者希望按时且完好地收到餐食，商家希望食物新鲜送达以让顾客满意，骑手需要以更少的劳动配送足够的订单，平台则追求高效运营服务。
These dispatch objectives should be precisely modeled in the MD scores between orders and couriers, and accurately calculated in the dispatch procedure. Meanwhile, trade-offs should be carefully made among them, to achieve long-term optimality of the whole system and all the stakeholders.
这些派单目标应在订单与骑手之间的匹配得分（MD 分数）中被精确建模，并在派单过程中被准确计算。同时，应在它们之间谨慎地做出权衡，以实现整个系统和所有利益相关者的长期最优。
A common method to handle these multi-objective problems is to combine the multiple objectives into a single merged objective with weights, known as scalarization methods (Gunantara 2018). However, finding and calibrating the proper weights on different objectives is laborious and nontrivial. The relative scales of different objectives change dramatically during different periods of each day. Thus the weights should be adaptively updated to ensure long-term optimality. But there is a lack of theoretical methods to guide the selection of such weights, especially in such an online and dynamic setting to guarantee long-term optimality.
一种常用的处理这些多目标问题的方法是将多个目标以权重合并为单一目标，称为标量化方法（Gunantara 2018）。然而，寻找并校准不同目标上合适的权重既费时又复杂。不同目标的相对尺度在一天的不同时段会发生剧烈变化。因此，权重应当被自适应地更新以确保长期最优性。但在这种在线和动态的环境下，缺乏理论方法来指导此类权重的选择，尤其是用于保证长期最优性的理论方法。
Full of Uncertainties Uncertainty is an inevitable characteristic of the food delivery process. Unexpected cases, such as traffic jams, extended food preparation time of the merchants, and couriers’ personal preferences, will greatly affect couriers’ behaviors, and the service quality of the related on-hand orders. However, these uncertainties, can neither be eliminated nor accurately sensed by the system. Moreover, the lack of adequate real-time monitoring of couriers’ and merchants’ status will further increase the uncertainties.
充满不确定性 不确定性是外卖配送过程不可避免的特征。诸如交通拥堵、商家延长备餐时间以及配送员的个人偏好等突发情况，会极大地影响配送员的行为以及相关在途订单的服务质量。然而，这些不确定性既无法被消除，也无法被系统准确感知。此外，对配送员和商家状态缺乏充分的实时监控将进一步增加不确定性。
Due to the existence of uncertainties, it is impossible for the system to make accurate point estimations on couriers’ behaviors, e.g., when the order will be picked up or delivered by the courier. Modeling the MD score and making dispatch decisions based on the inaccurate estimation results will weaken the effectiveness of the decision, thereby damaging the experience of consumers, couriers, and merchants. Take the food preparation time as an example, once the food is prepared slowly, the courier has to wait in the restaurant until it is finished, which may cause subsequent orders timeout and make conflicts between the couriers and the merchants. And the impacts of uncertainties will be further intensified by the couriers’ on-hand workload and bad weather.
由于存在不确定性，系统不可能对配送员的行为做出精准的点估计，例如配送员何时取单或送达。对 MD 评分建模并基于不准确的估计结果做出调度决策会削弱决策的有效性，从而损害消费者、配送员和商家的体验。以餐品制作时间为例，一旦餐品制作缓慢，配送员不得不在餐厅等待直至完成，这可能导致后续订单超时并引发配送员与商家之间的冲突。而配送员当前在手的工作量和恶劣天气会进一步加剧不确定性的影响。
Solving Large-scale NP-hard Integer Programming in Real-time For each dispatch period, the many-to-one assignment problem is NP-hard. And it is quite different from the one in a ride-hailing platform which is widely accepted as challenging. For ride-hailing, each driver is usually assigned only one order each time, while in ours, couriers are often assigned more than one order each time, even over 5 orders at noon peak. Hence, the scale of our problem is significantly
实时解决大规模 NP 难整数规划 在每个调度周期中，多对一指派问题是 NP 难的。它与广为人知但具有挑战性的网约车平台问题有明显不同。对于网约车，每位司机通常每次只被指派一单，而在我们这里，骑手往往每次被指派不止一单，午高峰时甚至超过 5 单。因此，我们问题的规模明显更大。
larger than the one-to-one problem. For example, the number of decision variables for a one-to-one assignment problem with N N NN assignment objects is of the order of N 2 N 2 N^(2)N^{2}, while the number of decision variables for a five-to-one assignment problem with N N NN assignment objects is of the order of N 6 N 6 N^(6)N^{6}. Furthermore, the MD scores between the couriers and orders are non-additive, namely, the MD score of assigning several orders simultaneously to a courier is not equal to the sum of the MD scores of assigning the orders separately to the same courier. However, computing the MD scores of arbitrary order combinations and the couriers is unrealistic, especially in a real-time manner, which further brings severe challenges to algorithm design.
比一对一问题大得多。例如，具有 N N NN 个分配对象的一对一分配问题的决策变量数量为 N 2 N 2 N^(2)N^{2} 量级，而具有 N N NN 个分配对象的五对一分配问题的决策变量数量为 N 6 N 6 N^(6)N^{6} 量级。此外，骑手与订单之间的 MD 分数是非可加的，即同时将若干订单分配给同一骑手的 MD 分数并不等于将这些订单分别分配给同一骑手的 MD 分数之和。然而，计算任意订单组合与骑手之间的 MD 分数是不现实的，尤其是在实时情况下，这进一步给算法设计带来严重挑战。
Since couriers are usually traveling fast, the OA problem must be solved in less than 10 seconds to ensure assignment quality, keeping the consistency of the courier status during the information acquisition period and assignment generation period. Traditional supply-chain optimization problems, even though suffering from large-scale searching space, they are allowed to be solved in hours. Thus their methods can not be directly adopted in the field of on-demand delivery.
由于骑手通常行驶速度较快，为保证指派质量并在信息获取期和指派生成期内保持骑手状态的一致性，OA 问题必须在不到 10 秒内得到解决。传统的供应链优化问题尽管面临大规模搜索空间，但允许用数小时求解，因此其方法无法直接应用于即时配送领域。

Technical Solution Algorithm Structure of the Dispatch System
调度系统的技术解决方案算法结构

To resolve the above challenges, the dispatch system firstly decomposes the original multi-period multi-objective stochastic assignment problem into a series of single-period single-objective deterministic sub problems, which can be solved independently at each dispatch moment, shown in (2) of the Appendix, through weight and matching score design. Then it develops effective algorithms for solving the sub problem via OR methods and ML techniques to obtain a high-quality solution with superior computational efficiency. At each dispatch period, the algorithm is executed as follows:
为了解决上述挑战，调度系统首先通过权重和匹配分数设计，将原始的多期多目标随机指派问题分解为一系列可在每个调度时刻独立求解的单期单目标确定性子问题（见附录的式（2））。然后通过运筹学方法和机器学习技术为该子问题开发高效算法，以在卓越的计算效率下获得高质量解。在每个调度周期，算法按如下方式执行：
In courier behavior estimation stage, the dispatch system updates the modeling and solution methods of the local courier’s RP problem, in order to continuously improve the route consistency rate between the planning routes and the real ones in the uncertain and time-varying environment. It provides a reliable evaluation basis for the evaluation stage.
在快递员行为估计阶段，调度系统更新本地快递员路径规划（RP）问题的建模和求解方法，以在不确定且时变的环境中持续提升规划路线与实际路线之间的一致率。它为评估阶段提供了可靠的评价依据。
In courier candidate evaluation stage, on one hand, the system adopts an online weight adaptation mechanism realizing the temporal decomposition and multi-objective integration. It aims to guild
在快递员候选评估阶段，一方面，系统采用在线权重自适应机制，实现时间分解与多目标整合。其目的是引导
the system states gradually evolving into an acceptable long-term balance among each objective. On the other hand, the system develops a robust and adaptive matching score calculation method to resolve the problems brought by uncertainties in the delivery process. Hence, it transforms the OA problem at each dispatch moment into a single-objective and deterministic one.
系统状态逐步演化为各目标之间可接受的长期平衡。另一方面，系统开发了稳健且自适应的匹配得分计算方法，以解决配送过程中不确定性带来的问题。因此，它将每次派单时刻的在线分配（OA）问题转化为单目标且确定性的问。
In O A O A OAO A generation stage, the system upgrades the algorithm to continuously improve the solution quality and computational efficiency. In addition to traditional OR methods, we adopt ML techniques to enhance the algorithm performance. One example is that we effectively prune the searching space and greatly improve the algorithm (both solution quality and computational efficiency), via graph neural network (GNN) methods to learn effective order combinations from experienced couriers’ behaviors.
在 O A O A OAO A 代生成阶段，系统升级算法以持续提升解的质量和计算效率。除了传统的运筹方法外，我们还采用机器学习技术来增强算法性能。一个例子是，我们通过图神经网络（GNN）方法从经验丰富的骑手行为中学习有效的订单组合，从而有效地剪枝搜索空间并大幅提升算法（包括解的质量和计算效率）。
The execution of the dispatch algorithm at each period is shown in Figure 5. Since we cannot compute the MD scores between arbitrary order combinations and couriers, the behavior estimation and evaluation of the courier candidates is only executed for some promising order combinations at each iteration, which are determined by the searching mechanism of the algorithm.

调度系统的主要算法组件介绍如下。

RP: Domain Refined Heuristics with Inverse Reinforcement Learning
RP：使用逆向强化学习的领域精炼启发式方法

Different pickup and delivery routes for the same courier, can result in different delivery distances as well as delivery time for each order. Figure 6 shows a simple example for different RP results. An inappropriate route implies further distance as well as longer time. This route related information acts as the most important evaluation basis for the matching decision between orders and couriers. Improving the route estimation accuracy is crucial to OA. Moreover, the RP service is called 48.3 million times per minute. These together raise demanding challenges for both the quality of the planning result and the time efficiency of the algorithm.
对于同一名骑手，不同的取送货路线会导致每个订单的配送距离和配送时间不同。图 6 展示了不同 RP 结果的一个简单示例。不合适的路线意味着更远的距离以及更长的时间。与路线相关的信息是订单与骑手匹配决策中最重要的评估依据。提高路线估算的准确性对 OA 至关重要。此外，RP 服务每分钟被调用 4830 万次。这些因素共同对规划结果的质量和算法的时间效率提出了极高的挑战。
Figure 6: Figure 6 An example for the RP. Different routes can result in different total delivery time (delivery ends at 11:50 and 12:05) and distances for the same courier.
图 6：图 6 为 RP 的一个示例。不同路线会导致同一名骑手的总配送时间（配送结束于 11:50 和 12:05）和距离不同。
To tackle these challenges, a domain refined heuristic search with inverse reinforcement learning (IRL) is designed for RP. In which, the heuristic search (Zheng et al. 2019) proposes optimal solutions for the RP with delivery time constraints, given a specific optimization objective. And the optimization objective, which directly determines the RP result, is learned from couriers’ historical pickup and delivery routes, so as to improve the route consistency rate between the planning routes and the real ones.
为应对这些挑战，我们为 RP 设计了一种结合逆向强化学习（IRL）的领域精化启发式搜索。在其中，启发式搜索（Zheng et al. 2019）在给定特定优化目标的情况下，为具有送达时间约束的 RP 提出最优解。而直接决定 RP 结果的优化目标是从骑手的历史取货与配送路线中学习得到的，以提高规划路线与实际路线之间的一致率。
Heuristic Search Based RP The heuristic search in our system is a Two-Stage Fast Heuristic method (Zheng et al. 2019), including an initialization stage and a local search stage. It is developed to find the optimal route which minimizes a specific optimization objective g ( r ) g ( r ) g(r)g(r), where r r rr is the pickup and delivery route and g g gg is the objective function. This search problem has two main constraints, precedence constraint and capacity constraint. The former means each order should
基于启发式搜索的 RP 我们系统中的启发式搜索为一种两阶段快速启发式方法（Zheng et al. 2019），包括初始化阶段和局部搜索阶段。该方法旨在找到使特定优化目标最小化的最优路线 g ( r ) g ( r ) g(r)g(r) ，其中 r r rr 为取货和配送路线， g g gg 为目标函数。该搜索问题有两个主要约束：先行约束和容量约束。前者意味着每个订单应在送达前被取货，后者则表示订单总量不得超过骑手的总容量。
be picked up before being delivered, and the latter suggests the orders should not exceed the total capacity of a courier.
应先被取货再被送达；后者则表明订单数量不应超过骑手的总运载能力。
The initialization stage is a greedy insertion procedure. We first sort the orders according to their ETA, then insert the pickup and delivery points of each order sequentially and greedily. This greedy insertion provides an initial solution for the RP.
初始化阶段为贪婪插入过程。我们首先根据预计到达时间（ETA）对订单进行排序，然后按顺序对每个订单的取货点和送达点进行贪婪插入。该贪婪插入为路径规划（RP）提供了初始解。
The local search stage is an optimization procedure based on the initial solution. We tempt to move delivery points with delays forward or otherwise, as illustrated in Figure 7. The pickup points are also moved simultaneously to achieve a better solution.
局部搜索阶段是在初始解基础上的优化过程。我们尝试将提前到达的送达点向后移动，或将延误的送达点向前移动，如图 7 所示。取货点也会同时移动以获得更优解。
Through these two stages, we can successfully reach the global optima (which are obtained by exact algorithms in an offline fashion) in 97 % 97 % 97%97 \% cases within 10 milliseconds.
通过这两个阶段，我们能够在 10 毫秒内成功达到全局最优（这些全局最优由离线精确算法获得）的情况有 97 % 97 % 97%97 \% 例。
Figure 7: Figure 7 The local search stage. We find the delivery point with most time ahead of its ETA and try to move it backward in order to find a better solution (Left). In the other case, we try to move the point with most delays forward (Right). The optima are updated using these local search operations.
图 7：图 7 局部搜索阶段。我们找到比 ETA 提前最多的送达点并尝试将其向后移动以寻找更优解（左）。在另一种情况下，我们尝试将延误最多的点向前移动（右）。最优解通过这些局部搜索操作进行更新。
RP Objective Function Learning with IRL Proper modeling of the RP objective function directly determines the solution quality and reliability. Initially, we can set up a manually defined function based on the delivery distance and the time over ETA (Zheng et al. 2019). However, it is obvious that the manual function can hardly depict how couriers make decisions during the
使用逆向强化学习进行 RP 目标函数学习 正确地建模 RP 目标函数直接决定了解的质量和可靠性。最初，我们可以基于配送距离和超出预计到达时间（ETA）的时长来设置一个手工定义的函数（Zheng et al. 2019）。然而，很明显，手工函数很难描绘快递员在配送过程中如何做出决策。

delivery process. Therefore, there is a fairly high chance that couriers will not deliver orders as expected and the planned routes are not even usable, especially for an uncertain and time-varying environment.
配送过程中。因此，很有可能快递员不会按预期配送订单，计划的路线甚至无法使用，尤其是在不确定且随时间变化的环境中。
To ensure the consistency between planned routes and couriers’ actual delivery ones, we propose to learn the objective function from couriers’ historical delivery routes. Specifically, a feature-based maximum entropy (MaxEnt) IRL (Ziebart et al. 2008, Finn et al. 2016, Kuderer et al. 2015) is used to learn a reward function (objective function g ( r ) g ( r ) g(r)g(r) in our case) from couriers’ historical delivery routes.
为确保规划路线与骑手实际送餐路线的一致性，我们提出从骑手的历史送餐路线中学习目标函数。具体来说，采用基于特征的最大熵（MaxEnt）逆强化学习（Ziebart et al. 2008, Finn et al. 2016, Kuderer et al. 2015）从骑手的历史送餐路线中学习一个奖励函数（在我们的情形中即目标函数 g ( r ) g ( r ) g(r)g(r) ）。
We assume that the possible routes for a courier are sampled from the distribution p ϕ ( r ) p ϕ ( r ) p_(phi)(r)p_{\phi}(r). The best route, which the courier prefers, has the highest reward (lowest cost) and the highest probabilities. Under this assumption, the probability of a route r r rr is defined as
我们假设骑手的可能路线服从分布 p ϕ ( r ) p ϕ ( r ) p_(phi)(r)p_{\phi}(r) 采样。骑手偏好的最佳路线具有最高的奖励（最低的代价）并且具有最高的概率。在此假设下，一条路线 r r rr 的概率定义为
P ϕ ( r ) = 1 Z ϕ e − g ( r ) P ϕ ( r ) = 1 Z ϕ e − g ( r ) P_(phi)(r)=(1)/(Z_(phi))e^(-g(r))P_{\phi}(r)=\frac{1}{Z_{\phi}} e^{-g(r)}
where Z ϕ = ∑ r ∈ R e − g ( r ) Z ϕ = ∑ r ∈ R   e − g ( r ) Z_(phi)=sum_(r in R)e^(-g(r))Z_{\phi}=\sum_{r \in R} e^{-g(r)} is the partition function and R R RR is the set of all possible routes. Figure 8 presents an illustration for our learning pipeline. Given the courier and order information, the heuristic search can produce a set of possible delivery routes during the local search, as well as the best route with the minimum cost. In our solution, a linear cost function is used,
其中 Z ϕ = ∑ r ∈ R e − g ( r ) Z ϕ = ∑ r ∈ R   e − g ( r ) Z_(phi)=sum_(r in R)e^(-g(r))Z_{\phi}=\sum_{r \in R} e^{-g(r)} 为配分函数， R R RR 为所有可能路线的集合。图 8 展示了我们学习流程的示意图。给定骑手和订单信息，启发式搜索在局部搜索过程中能产生一组可能的送餐路线，以及代价最小的最佳路线。在我们的方案中，采用了线性代价函数，

where G ( r ) G ( r ) G(r)G(r) is the feature vector of the route r r rr and θ θ theta\theta is the feature weights to be learned. After the heuristic search is finished, all possible delivery routes are added to a candidate route set. We extract features from these routes and learn the best parameter θ θ theta\theta which maximizes the probability of the route which the courier employs in the reality. The parameter θ θ theta\theta is then updated and used in the next run of heuristic search. A fixed iteration number and early stopping strategy can be used in the training considering the training dataset size. In practice, two main problems still exist, namely the feature representation of the route and the rationality of using the candidate route set in IRL. For the representation of the route, we propose tens of route features based on our domain knowledge. Generally, four kinds of route features are used, including delivery distance, delivery time, route complexity and courier’s preference. For example, the total navigation/line distance and the average navigation/line distance for pickup/delivery points are used in our implementation. For rationality of the candidate route set, we should sample all possible routes in an ideal IRL setting, which is, however, impossible as the number of orders increases. Instead, we take advantage of the information in the local search stage of the heuristic search. Large-scale temporary route samples are generated during the local search. This temporary route set can cover a large proportion of the routes with high probability. In that case, we treat this set as the possible route set R R RR, and replenish it by adding new routes during the training.
其中 G ( r ) G ( r ) G(r)G(r) 是路径 r r rr 的特征向量， θ θ theta\theta 是待学习的特征权重。启发式搜索结束后，所有可能的配送路径被加入候选路径集合。我们从这些路径中提取特征，并学习使骑手在现实中采用的路径概率最大的最优参数 θ θ theta\theta 。然后更新参数 θ θ theta\theta 并在下一轮启发式搜索中使用。考虑到训练数据集的规模，训练过程中可以使用固定的迭代次数和提前停止策略。实际上仍存在两个主要问题，即路径的特征表征以及在逆向强化学习中使用候选路径集合的合理性。关于路径的表征，我们基于领域知识提出了数十个路径特征。总体上使用四类路径特征，包括配送距离、配送时间、路径复杂度和骑手偏好。例如，在我们的实现中使用了总导航/线路距离以及取货/送货点的平均导航/线路距离。 为了候选路线集的合理性，在理想的逆向强化学习（IRL）设置中我们应当对所有可能的路线进行采样，但随着订单数量的增加这是不可能的。相反，我们利用启发式搜索的局部搜索阶段中所包含的信息。在局部搜索过程中会生成大规模的临时路线样本。该临时路线集有很大概率覆盖大量的高可能性路线。在这种情况下，我们将该集合视为可能的路线集 R R RR ，并在训练过程中通过添加新路线来补充它。
Through IRL, we provide a learning solution for the objective function in the heuristic searchbased RP. Additionally, our RP algorithm is developed as a Java package and serves the system using several clusters.
通过逆向强化学习，我们为基于启发式搜索的路线规划问题提供了目标函数的学习解法。此外，我们的路线规划算法作为一个 Java 包开发，并通过若干集群对系统提供服务。

MD Score Calculation: Adaptive Risk Decision-making through Bayesian Optimization
MD 分数计算：通过贝叶斯优化的自适应风险决策

Considering the inevitable uncertainties of delivery process, and the impacts of resulting invalid dispatch decisions, risk management is introduced to improve decision effectiveness and robustness. One widely used tool is conditional value-at-risk (CVaR) (Tamar et al. 2015), which is a statistical measurement quantifying the worst-case risk of the performance distribution. Moreover, to evaluate the MD for the courier and orders under normal circumstances, the average performance is also
考虑到配送过程不可避免的不确定性以及由此产生的无效调度决策的影响，引入风险管理以提高决策的有效性和鲁棒性。一种被广泛使用的工具是条件在险价值（CVaR）(Tamar et al. 2015)，它是一种量化性能分布最坏情况风险的统计度量。此外，为了在正常情况下评估骑手和订单的平均交付时间（MD），还需要考察平均绩效。
important. Therefore, MD score should comprehensively consider the courier’s performance in both high-risk and average states as shown in (3), where α ∈ ( 0 , 1 ) α ∈ ( 0 , 1 ) alpha in(0,1)\alpha \in(0,1) denotes the degree of risk aversion.
重要。因此，MD 得分应如公式(3)所示，全面考虑骑手在高风险状态和一般状态下的表现，其中 α ∈ ( 0 , 1 ) α ∈ ( 0 , 1 ) alpha in(0,1)\alpha \in(0,1) 表示风险厌恶程度。
f = ( 1 − α ) f e + α f r f = ( 1 − α ) f e + α f r f=(1-alpha)f^(e)+alphaf^(r)f=(1-\alpha) f^{e}+\alpha f^{r}
Accordingly, there are two major difficulties in MD score evaluation. On one hand, real-time decision-making needs to be done in milliseconds, while the calculation of risk measurements involves large-scale sampling and repeated RP calculation for each sample. Effective sampling method should be adopted to reduce complexity at the same time guarantee the accuracy of the tail risk. On the other hand, the system has different risk attitudes in different scenarios. Achieving adaptive risk aversion degree with minimum trial and error cost online is also an urgent issue.
因此，MD 评分评估存在两大难点。一方面，实时决策需在毫秒级完成，而风险度量的计算涉及大规模抽样并对每个样本重复计算 RP。应采用有效的抽样方法以在降低复杂度的同时保证尾部风险的准确性。另一方面，系统在不同场景下具有不同的风险偏好。在线上以最小的试错成本实现自适应的风险规避程度也是一项紧迫问题。
The process of matching score evaluation can be divided into two parts:
匹配评分评估的过程可以分为两部分：
Calculation of risk measurements. Without loss of generality, we only take the mealtime uncertainty into account. As shown in Figure 9, assume a courier is assigned L L LL orders in total, the mealtime of the l l ll-th pickup node, denoted as t m l t m l t_(ml)t_{m l}, obeys independent distribution denoted as h m l ( t ) h m l ( t ) h_(ml)(t)h_{m l}(t). First, we adopt online layered sampling (Ding and Wang 2020) for each mealtime to satisfy the requirement for millisecond-level calculation. Next, considering that the execution time of nodes in sequence are highly correlated with each other, we integrate the point-wise mealtime samples into route samples through route conduction. The total overtime interval of each route sample can then be separately evaluated as MD score samples. Finally, the MD score samples are aggregated into risk measurements under two states. Given the risk percentage β β beta\beta and the number of samples N N NN, the CVaR of scores, i.e. f r f r f^(r)f^{r}, is approximated by averaging the worst β N β N beta N\beta N MD score samples, and f e f e f^(e)f^{e} is obtained by averaging all MD score samples.
风险度量的计算。为简化讨论，我们仅考虑送餐时间的不确定性。如图 9 所示，假设某骑手总共被指派了 L L LL 个订单，第 l l ll 个取餐点的送餐时间，记为 t m l t m l t_(ml)t_{m l} ，服从独立分布，记为 h m l ( t ) h m l ( t ) h_(ml)(t)h_{m l}(t) 。首先，我们对每个送餐时间采用在线分层抽样（Ding and Wang 2020），以满足毫秒级计算的要求。接着，考虑到序列中节点的执行时间彼此高度相关，我们通过路径传导将逐点的送餐时间样本整合为路径样本。随后，每个路径样本的总超时区间可以分别作为 MD 分数样本进行评估。最后，在两种状态下将 MD 分数样本聚合为风险度量。给定风险百分比 β β beta\beta 和样本数量 N N NN ，分数的条件风险值（CVaR），即 f r f r f^(r)f^{r} ，通过对最差的 β N β N beta N\beta N 个 MD 分数样本取平均来近似，而 f e f e f^(e)f^{e} 则通过对所有 MD 分数样本取平均得到。
Risk aversion degree adaptation. In practice, the system may have different risk preferences for uncertainties in different operational scenarios. We need to adapt the risk aversion degree to real operational scenarios according to the near-real-time performance feedback. However, the mapping function between the risk aversion degree and the performance indicators of interest(e.g., on-time rate, travel distance) under the uncertain and time-varying environment does not assume any
风险厌恶度自适应。在实践中，系统在不同的运营场景下可能对不确定性有不同的风险偏好。我们需要根据近实时的性能反馈将风险厌恶度适配到实际运营场景中。然而，在不确定且时变的环境下，风险厌恶度与感兴趣的性能指标（例如准时率、行驶距离）之间的映射函数并不假定任何
Figure 9: Figure 9 Calculation procedure of risk measurements can be divided into three steps: online sampling of mealtime, route sample integration, MD score aggregation.
图 9：图 9 风险度量的计算程序可分为三步：用餐时间的在线采样、路线样本整合、MD 评分聚合。
specific analytical functional forms. Therefore, the idea of Bayesian optimization, namely, black-box optimization (Frazier 2018) is introduced.
具体的解析函数形式。因此，引入了贝叶斯优化的思想，即黑盒优化（Frazier 2018）。
As shown in Figure 10, in the offline training phase, we choose Gaussian process(GP) model to fit the probabilistic mapping function. In the online decision-making phase, we build the model input for each risk aversion degree in the candidate set, together with environmental context and time series variable, and run the GP model. The outputs are expressed as the mean and variance of the online performance indicators to be optimized. The best risk aversion degree for the next observation period (every 30 minutes in practice) is selected based on the upper confidence bound (UCB) (Contal et al. 2013) criterion, with the principle of delivery experience and efficiency balance. At the end of each observation period, the performance indicators of interest evolve to new states and the model is updated accordingly.
如图 10 所示，在离线训练阶段，我们选择高斯过程（GP）模型来拟合概率映射函数。在在线决策阶段，我们为候选集合中每个风险厌恶度构建模型输入，连同环境上下文和时间序列变量，一并输入 GP 模型。输出以需优化的在线性能指标的均值和方差形式表示。下一个观测周期（实际中每 30 分钟）最佳的风险厌恶度基于上置信界（UCB）（Contal et al. 2013）准则进行选择，遵循配送体验与效率平衡的原则。在每个观测周期结束时，关注的性能指标演化到新的状态，模型随之更新。
This method can obtain the desired degree value with minimum trial and error cost, and ensure the stability and decision feasibility of the online dispatch system.
该方法能够以最低的试错成本获得期望的度值，并确保在线派单系统的稳定性和决策可行性。
Our risk decision-making system with adaptive risk aversion degree has undergone AB testing in 9 cities across China, where the optimal degree factor of each time period fluctuates between
我们具有自适应风险厌恶度的风险决策系统已在中国 9 个城市进行了 AB 测试，各时段的最优度因子在...

图 10：图 10 风险规避程度自适应由离线模型训练和在线决策两个迭代阶段组成。
0.5 and 0.95 . Evaluation results show that the on time rate increases by 0.27 pp , and the average travel distance reduces by 1.20 % 1.20 % 1.20%1.20 \%.
0.5 和 0.95。评估结果显示，准时率提高了 0.27 个百分点，平均行驶距离减少了 1.20 % 1.20 % 1.20%1.20 \% 。

Dynamic Objective Weight Adaptation Combining Online Decision with Offline Planning
动态目标权重自适应：将在线决策与离线规划相结合

To balance different dispatch goals, a target-oriented multi-objective balancing framework inspired by Lyu et al. (2019) is implemented to adaptively adjust the weights of different objectives during the sequential dispatch process.
为了平衡不同的调度目标，我们实现了一个以目标为导向的多目标平衡框架，借鉴了 Lyu et al. (2019) 的思想，在顺序调度过程中自适应地调整不同目标的权重。
We first obtain the “ideal point” from historical operational data, which represents a desired or highly-acceptable value of each objective we seek for long term, and served as the evolving targets of the system during the whole dispatch process. Then the weight of each objective is adjusted based on the gap between the objective’s current value and corresponding target at each dispatch period, aiming at decomposing the original assignment problem into independent single-period ones, and guiding the system states finally converging to a solution nearest to the target.
我们首先从历史运营数据中得到“理想点”，它代表我们长期追求的每个目标的一个期望或高度可接受的数值，并在整个调度过程中作为系统不断演进的目标。随后，每个目标的权重会根据该目标在每一调度周期的当前值与对应目标之间的差距进行调整，旨在将原始的分配问题分解为独立的单期问题，并引导系统状态最终收敛到最接近目标的解。
Since the values of objectives change dramatically during the daily horizon, we divide each day into a series of dispatch periods. U p t o U p t o U_(p_(t))^(o)U_{p_{t}}^{o} is the “ideal point” of objective o o oo during period p t p t p_(t)p_{t}, where time step t t tt is in period p t p t p_(t)p_{t}.
由于目标值在日内时段内剧烈变化，我们将每一天划分为一系列调度周期。 U p t o U p t o U_(p_(t))^(o)U_{p_{t}}^{o} 是第 p t p t p_(t)p_{t} 个周期内目标 o o oo 的“理想点”，其中时间步 t t tt 属于周期 p t p t p_(t)p_{t} 。
During the online dispatch process, U p t o U p t o U_(p_(t))^(o)U_{p_{t}}^{o} is used as the target at time step t . δ t o = U p t o − f t o t . δ t o = U p t o − f t o t.delta_(t)^(o)=U_(p_(t))^(o)-f_(t)^(o)t . \delta_{t}^{o}=U_{p_{t}}^{o}-f_{t}^{o} is calculated to measure the gap between the objective value f t o f t o f_(t)^(o)f_{t}^{o} and the ideal point U p t o U p t o U_(p_(t))^(o)U_{p_{t}}^{o} at time step t t tt. To get weights for the next time step t + 1 t + 1 t+1t+1, exponential smoothing is used to average the gaps

Figure 11: Figure 11 Implementation of the multi-objective balancing framework. The "ideal point" is generated based on the performance of historical dispatch decisions and provided as offline features to the dispatch system. The dynamic weights are transferred as real-time features between different dispatch moments. During each dispatch moment, the objective weights are updated based on the gaps between current objectives and ideal points.
图 11：多目标平衡框架的实现。基于历史调度决策的性能生成“理想点”，并作为离线特征提供给调度系统。动态权重作为实时特征在不同调度时刻之间传递。在每个调度时刻，目标权重根据当前目标与理想点之间的差距进行更新。
Our current implementation is demonstrated in Figure 11. The “ideal point” is generated based on the performance of historical dispatch decisions. The objective values of historical decisions are averaged by cities and periods, where a filtering mechanism is also implemented to reduce the noise in historical data. Then, offsets are added to the average historical values, to provide overall guidance for the dispatch process. These offsets can be tuned to suit the preferences of decision-makers for different goals.
我们当前的实现如图 11 所示。“理想点”是基于历史调度决策的性能生成的。历史决策的目标值按城市和时段进行平均，同时还实现了一个过滤机制以减少历史数据的噪声。然后，在平均历史值上加入偏移量，以为调度过程提供整体指导。这些偏移量可以进行调节，以适应决策者对不同目标的偏好。
This framework is implemented in the dispatch system, and AB tests are done to measure its performance. It is tested in 5 cities in China, where the on-time rate increases by 0.33 pp , and the average travel distance reduces by 0.92 % 0.92 % 0.92%0.92 \%. During the experiment, the daily cumulative MD score of the experimental group is optimized by 3.6 % − 4.5 % 3.6 % − 4.5 % 3.6%-4.5%3.6 \%-4.5 \%.
该框架已在调度系统中实现，并通过 AB 测试来衡量其性能。它在中国的 5 个城市进行了测试，到达准时率提高了 0.33 个百分点，平均行驶距离减少了 0.92 % 0.92 % 0.92%0.92 \% 。在实验期间，实验组的每日累计 MD 评分被优化了 3.6 % − 4.5 % 3.6 % − 4.5 % 3.6%-4.5%3.6 \%-4.5 \% 。

OA: OR Methods Combined with ML
OA：结合机器学习的运筹方法

The solution quality and computational efficiency of the OA algorithm are of great importance. The dispatch system improves traditional OR methods via ML techniques and explores several ways to optimize the algorithm performance.
OA 算法的解质量和计算效率至关重要。调度系统通过机器学习技术改进了传统的运筹方法，并探索了多种优化算法性能的途径。

Method 1: "Divide-and-Conquer" Framework with Imitation Learning and GNN
方法 1：“分而治之”框架，结合模仿学习与图神经网络 (GNN)

Algorithm Framework For solving many-to-one assignment problems in a real-time manner, the dispatch system develops an enhanced “divide-and-conquer” solution framework, i.e., decomposes the original large-scare many-to-one assignment problem at each dispatch moment into a series of one-to-one sub problems which are solved sequentially, resulting in a progressive solution procedure online. Each of the sub-problems is quite simple and can be solved in polynomial time, thus greatly reducing the computation burden. To guarantee solution quality the decomposition and iteration rounds are carefully guided and controlled by a global coordinator, which is a ML model trained by an imitation learning (IL) approach Chen et al. (2022). High-quality expert solutions are obtained by a well-designed offline OR algorithm. The “divide-and-conquer” framework is depicted in Figure 12.
算法框架 为了以实时方式求解多对一指派问题，派单系统开发了一个增强的“分而治之”解决框架，即在每次派单时将原始的大规模多对一指派问题分解为一系列一对一子问题，并按顺序逐个求解，从而在在线环境中形成渐进的求解过程。每个子问题都相当简单，可以在多项式时间内解决，从而大大减轻计算负担。为了保证解的质量，分解和迭代轮次由一个全局协调器精心引导和控制，该协调器是一个通过模仿学习（IL）方法训练的机器学习模型 Chen et al. (2022)。高质量的专家解由精心设计的离线运筹学算法获得。“分而治之”框架如图 12 所示。
Divide-and-Conquer strategy. The divide-and-conquer strategy splits orders into multiple iterative steps to construct the corresponding assignment results in sequence, that is, at each iteration, only a part of the orders are assigned to the couriers. The iteration process ends when a complete assignment result is generated. Within this framework, the many-to-one assignment result is built by separating the orders into different iterations, rather than a direct combination. Only limited MD scores are calculated at each iteration, thus greatly reducing the calculation volume of the previous stages. Moreover, the sub problem at each iteration degrades to a polynomial-time one and the scale is much smaller than the original one, which can be solved quite easily by traditional OR methods, such as the Kuhn-Munkras algorithm Munkres (1957).
分而治之策略。分而治之策略将订单拆分为多个迭代步骤，按序构建相应的派单结果，也就是说，在每次迭代中，只有部分订单会被分配给配送员。迭代过程在生成完整的派单结果时结束。在此框架内，多对一的派单结果是通过将订单分散到不同迭代中构建的，而不是直接组合。每次迭代只计算有限的 MD 分数，从而大大减少了前几阶段的计算量。此外，每次迭代的子问题退化为一个多项式时间问题，其规模也远小于原问题，传统的运筹学方法（如 Kuhn–Munkres 算法 Munkres (1957)）可以很容易地解决该子问题。
Therefore, within this framework, choosing orders to assign at each round, namely, the way to realize decomposition, is of great importance to the solution quality. With well-designed decomposition strategies, the methods can achieve better solution quality with limited MD score calculation
因此，在此框架内，每一轮选择要分配的订单，即实现分解的方式，对解的质量至关重要。通过精心设计的分解策略，这些方法可以在有限的 MD 分数计算下获得更好的解质量。
Figure 12: Figure 12 "Divide-and-Conquer" framework by IL: the original many-to-one assignment problem is decomposed into a series of one-to-one sub-assignment problems which are solved sequentially. A global coordinator is trained offline by IL methods with high-quality solutions as its labels. And it controls and guides the online solution procedure.
图 12：IL 的“分而治之”框架：原始的多对一指派问题被分解为一系列一对一的子指派问题，按顺序逐个求解。一个全局协调器通过 IL 方法在离线训练，使用高质量解作为其标签。它控制并指导在线求解过程。
volume, which is polynomial-related or even linearly-related to the order scale, instead of combination explosion. Meanwhile, the algorithm for solving each sub problem is of polynomial computing complexity.
量级与订单规模呈多项式相关，甚至线性相关，而不是组合爆炸。同时，求解每个子问题的算法具有多项式计算复杂度。
Execution Architecture. In practice, to improve the solution quality, the dispatch system adopts a ML coordinator to guide the decomposition online. The dispatch system is trained by IL method offline and uses expert solutions from enhanced tabu search method as its labels.
执行架构。实际上，为了提高解的质量，调度系统采用一个 ML 协调器在在线阶段指导分解。该调度系统通过 IL 方法在离线训练，并使用来自改进禁忌搜索方法的专家解作为其标签。
During the offline training stage, the traditional tabu search method is optimized to improve its solution quality, by adding several well-designed operators, including the double shift operator, the long chain operator, and so on. Based on the expert solutions generated by the enhanced tabu search method, we employ the IL method He et al. (2012) to train a global coordinator generating the optimal matching probability of the orders and their available couriers.
在离线训练阶段，对传统禁忌搜索方法进行了优化以提高其解的质量，通过加入若干精心设计的算子，包括双移位算子、长链算子等。基于由增强的禁忌搜索方法生成的专家解，我们采用了 He 等人（2012）提出的 IL 方法来训练一个全局协调器，生成订单与其可用骑手之间的最优匹配概率。
During the online solution stage, the orders to assign at each iteration are chosen according to the online inference outputs of the coordinator, i.e., orders with higher average optimal matching probabilities will be selected to be assigned at the current iteration. Since the coordinator extracts
在在线求解阶段，每次迭代要分配的订单根据协调器的在线推断输出进行选择，即具有更高平均最优匹配概率的订单将被选中在当前迭代中分配。由于协调器提取
Figure 13: Figure 13 Framework of modeling delivery network via GNN. It contains three steps: 1) delivery network construction: constructing an efficient delivery graph with flow (aggregation of orders with same origin and destination) as basic unit by merging massive delivery records from experienced couriers; 2) graph representation learning: applying GNN to model the graph and extract combination patterns from it as representative vectors of each flow; 3) online order combination: using representative vectors to cluster orders into various groups to decompose assignment task, and work with following dispatch algorithm to achieve better matching results.
图 13：图 13 通过 GNN 对配送网络建模的框架。它包含三步：1）配送网络构建：通过合并大量有经验骑手的配送记录，构建以流（相同起点和终点的订单聚合）为基本单元的高效配送图；2）图表示学习：应用 GNN 对图进行建模并从中提取组合模式，作为每个流的代表向量；3）在线订单组合：使用代表向量对订单进行聚类，分解指派任务，并与后续的调度算法配合以实现更好的匹配结果。
global information of the expert solutions, the algorithm can effectively avoid local greed, moreover, it can search more widely and deeply of the searching space, thus closing to expert solution quality.
通过利用专家解的全局信息，该算法能够有效避免局部贪心，此外，它能够更广泛、更深入地搜索解空间，从而接近专家解的质量。
The proposed algorithm significantly improved assignment quality by optimizing the solutions’ objective values by 5 − 10 % 5 − 10 % 5-10%5-10 \%, and with the growth of the order volume, the optimization degree is even higher.
所提出的算法通过优化解的目标值将指派质量显著提升了 5 − 10 % 5 − 10 % 5-10%5-10 \% ，且随着订单量的增长，优化程度更高。

Online Order Combination: learning from experienced courier via GNN In order to
在线订单组合：通过 GNN 向有经验的骑手学习 为了

reduce the iteration rounds and further improve the computation efficiency without sacrificing solution quality, it is necessary to construct an efficient online order combination mechanism, making the sub-problem at each iteration generate many-to-one assignments. The mechanism should be able to recognize the complicated relationship between different orders and find effective ways to combine them as different uncoupled groups.
为了在不牺牲解的质量的前提下降低迭代轮数并进一步提高计算效率，有必要构建一个高效的在线订单组合机制，使每次迭代的子问题能够产生多对一的指派。该机制应能识别不同订单之间的复杂关系，并找到有效方法将它们组合成不同的非耦合群组。
An intuitive solution is to group orders with nearby origin-destination and delivery time-window to share delivery resources. We call this method a static order combination when it only uses limited and static information from the order itself. After interviewing experienced couriers and trying to
一种直观的解决方案是将起讫点和送达时间窗相近的订单分组以共享配送资源。当仅利用订单自身的有限且静态的信息时，我们称这种方法为静态订单组合。在采访了有经验的配送员并尝试
deliver orders in practice, we find that many couriers can group various orders flexibly with their personal perceptions and fruitful experiences learned during working, which is more complicated than the static grouping methods.
在实际配送中，我们发现许多配送员能够凭借个人感知和在工作中积累的丰富经验灵活地将各种订单组合起来，这比静态分组方法更为复杂。
Thus, we further develop a GNN-based framework by directly learning knowledge from experienced couriers to guide the online order combination. With the learning-from-human mechanism, this method can discover more delivery patterns and cluster orders with effective and flexible ways of solving the assignment problem. The whole framework of the proposed method is presented in Figure 13. Detailed designs of three steps are described as follows.
因此，我们进一步发展了一个基于图神经网络的框架，通过直接从有经验的骑手处学习知识来指导线上订单的组合。借助“向人学习”的机制，该方法能够发现更多的配送模式，并以有效且灵活的方式对订单进行聚类以解决指派问题。所提方法的整体框架如图 13 所示。以下对三个步骤的具体设计进行描述。
Delivery Network Construction. We first group orders with the same origin and destination as flow. Following the experience from couriers, we pre-process the delivery order sequence from selected couriers as independent delivery sessions and convert each session to a flow session. When regarding flow as a node and nearby relation in sequence as a link, we can merge these flow sessions into a union graph as a delivery network. Furthermore, each flow node also owns fruitful attributes to describe its crucial character, e.g., the delivery distance between origin and destination and the average delivery time in the past 30 days.
配送网络构建。我们首先将具有相同起点和终点的订单分组为流。遵循骑手的经验，我们将从选定骑手处预处理得到的配送订单序列视为独立的配送会话，并将每个会话转换为流会话。将流视为节点、序列中的邻近关系视为连边后，我们可以将这些流会话合并成一个作为配送网络的并图。此外，每个流节点还具有丰富的属性来描述其重要特征，例如起点与终点之间的配送距离以及过去 30 天的平均配送时间。
Graph Representation Learning. With the flow-based delivery network as input, we apply graph representation learning methods Hamilton (2020) to extract specific patterns from it. We aim to learn the vector representation of the node which contains the attributes and the topology information of it in the graph after training. We apply classic graph learning models Wang et al. (2018), Hamilton et al. (2017) to learn the basic vector representation of flow node, and some wellknown tricks Bengio et al. (2009) are also applied to optimize the quality of vector representation.
图表示学习。以基于流的配送网络为输入，我们应用图表示学习方法 Hamilton (2020) 从中提取特定模式。我们的目标是在训练后学习节点的向量表示，该向量包含节点在图中的属性和拓扑信息。我们采用经典的图学习模型 Wang et al. (2018), Hamilton et al. (2017) 来学习流节点的基础向量表示，并且还应用了一些著名的技巧 Bengio et al. (2009) 来优化向量表示的质量。
Online Order Combination. After obtaining the vector representation of the flow node, we define a similarity-based mechanism to combine the orders together. Basically, we use the dot-product results of vector representations of two flow nodes as the similarity metric of combination. Similar flow nodes with large dot-product results can be regarded as a group to participate in the assignment problem. As the right part in Figure 13 shows, we use this similarity metric to cluster the historical orders into communities and validate the responsibility of clustering results by humans in various cases.
在线订单组合。在获得流节点的向量表示后，我们定义了一种基于相似度的机制来将订单组合在一起。基本上，我们使用两个流节点向量表示的点积结果作为组合的相似度度量。相似的流节点若具有较大的点积结果，可以被视为一组参与指派问题。如图 13 右侧所示，我们使用该相似度度量将历史订单聚类为若干社区，并在各种情况下由人工验证聚类结果的合理性。

Method 2: Multi-stage Sub-problem Reformulation with ML
方法二：结合机器学习的多阶段子问题重构

We also propose a multi-stage solution algorithm based on neighborhood search and ML to solve the many-to-one assignment problem at each dispatch moment. The algorithm constructs sub problems by adding constraints to the original one, which limits the variations in the solution space of the current stage sub problem compared to the previous stage. Specifically, one of the sources of the complexity of the original many-to-one assignment problem is that orders and orders can be arbitrarily batched and assigned to the same courier (the number of batched groups grows exponentially with the number of orders in the groups). To reduce complexity, the main constraints added to the sub problem are the selections of the new batched groups that can be added in the current stage. In addition, we also include constraints on the number of assignable couriers for the orders/groups and the number of assignable orders for the courier. These added constraints greatly reduce the scale and complexity of the problem, resulting in a significant reduction in the construction and solution complexity. By solving the many-stage sub problems sequentially, an approximate solution to the original problem is obtained.
我们还提出了一种基于邻域搜索和机器学习的多阶段求解算法，用于在每个调度时刻解决多对一分配问题。该算法通过向原问题添加约束来构造子问题，相对于前一阶段，限制当前阶段子问题解空间的变动。具体而言，原始多对一分配问题复杂性的来源之一在于订单可以任意合并成批并分配给同一骑手（批组合的数量随组内订单数呈指数增长）。为降低复杂性，子问题中加入的主要约束是限制当前阶段可新增的批次组选择。此外，我们还对订单/批次可分配的骑手数量以及每个骑手可分配的订单数量施加约束。这些新增约束大幅缩减了问题的规模和复杂性，从而显著降低了构建和求解的复杂度。 通过按顺序求解多个阶段的子问题，得到了原始问题的近似解。
One of the key aspects of the proposed many-stage solution algorithm is how to select appropriate new constraints. We utilize a combination of rule-based and ML-based constraint generation methods to achieve better results. For the rule-based method, expert knowledge is used to generate various constraints. For example, we can have the rule that only the orders that have near pick-up points can be batched and assigned to the same courier, or that each order can only be assigned to the courier when the order’s pick-up point is close to the courier’s current location. Different rules will affect the construction of sub problems, which in turn affects the solution quality and efficiency of the original problem. We apply these rules to our practical examples and choose the best rules that balance quality and efficiency. For the ML-based method, the branch-and-bound method is used to solve the many-to-one assignment problems offline and the resulting batched groups are used to train an XGBoost-based classification model Chen et al. (2015) to predict whether the batched groups will appear in the final solutions. In the online stage, the model predictions are used
所提出的多阶段求解算法的关键点之一是如何选择合适的新约束。我们结合基于规则和基于机器学习的约束生成方法以获得更好的结果。对于基于规则的方法，利用专家知识生成各种约束。例如，我们可以制定规则：只有取货点接近的订单可以被合并并分配给同一名骑手，或者只有当订单的取货点接近骑手当前位置时，才可以将订单分配给该骑手。不同的规则会影响子问题的构建，进而影响原始问题的解的质量和效率。我们将这些规则应用于实际示例，并选择在质量与效率之间取得平衡的最佳规则。对于基于机器学习的方法，在线下使用分支定界法求解多对一分配问题，得到的合并组用于训练基于 XGBoost 的分类模型 Chen et al. (2015)，以预测这些合并组是否会出现在最终解中。在在线阶段，使用模型的预测结果来
to generate constraints to guide the selections of batched groups. By combining these methods, the construction of each sub problem (i.e. the computation time of f t , w ¯ o , r f t , w ¯ o , r f_(t, bar(w))^(o,r)f_{t, \bar{w}}^{o, r} ) can be completed within seconds.
用于生成约束以引导分批组的选择。通过结合这些方法，每个子问题的构建（即 f t , w ¯ o , r f t , w ¯ o , r f_(t, bar(w))^(o,r)f_{t, \bar{w}}^{o, r} 的计算时间）可以在数秒内完成。
Although we have limited the complexity of the sub problems by adding constraints, they still cannot be solved in real-time using exact methods such as branch-and-bound. To address this, we propose a variable neighborhood search algorithm Hansen and Mladenović (2001) where we design neighborhood operators to exploit the problem structure and numerical features. During the neighborhood search process, we efficiently select the optimal neighborhood operator by estimating the impact of the operator on the objective function. This allows for efficient searching and highquality solutions.
尽管我们通过添加约束限制了子问题的复杂度，但它们仍无法用分支定界等精确方法实时求解。为此，我们提出了一种变邻域搜索算法 Hansen and Mladenović (2001)，在其中设计了邻域算子以利用问题结构和数值特征。在邻域搜索过程中，我们通过估计算子对目标函数的影响来高效选择最优邻域算子。这使得搜索高效且能得到高质量的解。
An illustrative example of the proposed method is shown in Figure 14. Noted that the proposed multi-stage solution algorithm shares some merits with general large-neighborhood search algorithms Pisinger and Ropke (2019). However, by carefully designing the added constraints based on the problem characteristics, we have been able to significantly reduce the complexity while making the solution trajectory quickly approach the optimal solution. Typically, only 3-5 stages are needed to converge to a satisfactory near-optimal solution and the total construction and solution time is within 10 seconds.
图 14 展示了所提出方法的一个示例。值得注意的是，所提出的多阶段求解算法在某些方面与一般的大邻域搜索算法 Pisinger 和 Ropke (2019) 有相似之处。然而，通过基于问题特性对新增约束进行精心设计，我们能够显著降低复杂度，同时使解的轨迹快速接近最优解。通常只需 3–5 个阶段即可收敛到令人满意的近似最优解，且总的构建和求解时间在 10 秒之内。

Reassginment: Technical Solutions for Abnormal Scenario
重新分配：异常场景的技术解决方案

In most cases, the courier who accepts the assignment is expected to deliver the assigned order. However, since we assign orders tens of minutes before their arrival, we cannot predict all the potential incidents that couriers may encounter during the actual delivery process. If unforeseen or extremely tail-end incidents arise, completing the original assignments may negatively affect the delivery experience and efficiency of the courier. For example, when delivering multiple orders, if the preparation of one order takes too long, the courier has to wait for the order at the merchant, which will delay the arrival time of the multiple orders. We use the reassignment scheme to address this problem: based on the latest environmental and estimated information, we reassign orders
在大多数情况下，接单的骑手会被期望完成所分配的订单。然而，由于我们是在订单到达前数十分钟进行分配，无法预见骑手在实际配送过程中可能遇到的所有突发情况。如果出现无法预料或极端的尾部事件，继续执行原始分配可能会对骑手的配送体验和配送效率产生负面影响。例如，在配送多份订单时，如果其中一份订单的制作时间过长，骑手就不得不在商家处等待该订单，从而导致多份订单的到达时间被延迟。为了解决这个问题，我们使用了重新分配方案：基于最新的环境和估计信息，我们对订单进行重新分配。
Figure 14: Figure 14 An illustrative example using the proposed multi-stage solution algorithm, where 4 orders and 4 couriers are considered. At each stage, the constraints generation method is utilized to add constraints to the original problem, formulating a sub problem with smaller complexity (i.e., fewer edges allowed). The constraints generation uses the original problem and the solution of the previous stage as inputs, forming a solution space that is close to the previous solution and contains the optimal solution if possible. The proposed variable neighborhood search algorithm is then implemented to solve the sub problem. The overall method stops when no more new sub-problems can be formulated or solutions of consecutive stages remain the same. In this example, the method stops after 3 stages.
图 14：图 14 使用所提出的多阶段求解算法的示意例子，其中考虑了 4 个订单和 4 名配送员。在每个阶段，约束生成方法被用来向原问题添加约束，构造复杂度更小的子问题（即允许的边更少）。约束生成以原问题和前一阶段的解为输入，形成一个接近前一阶段解且在可能时包含最优解的解空间。随后实施所提出的变邻域搜索算法来求解该子问题。当无法再构造新的子问题或连续阶段的解保持不变时，整体方法停止。在此例中，该方法在第 3 阶段后停止。
that have not yet been picked up to other appropriate couriers if it will improve the quality of assignment and delivery efficiency in dynamic and uncertain environments.
那些尚未被取走的订单会被重新分配给其他合适的配送员，以在动态和不确定的环境中提升派单质量和配送效率。
Our system implements two types of reassignment. One is initiated by the system, and the other is initiated by the courier. Both types have similar processes:
我们的系统实现了两种类型的重新分配。一种由系统发起，另一种由配送员发起。两种类型的流程类似：
Step 1: Collecting orders for reassignment. For those initiated by the system, the orders that are worth reassigning are identified by an online algorithm that monitors the delivery process of couriers. Specifically, we run RP algorithms every minute to estimate the delivery sequences and distances of the courier in the case of completing all the assigned orders, as well as the cases where one of the orders is removed from the courier. By comparing the estimated delivery processes of the courier before and after reduction, we choose the order that is most beneficial for delivery efficiency as the order needed to be reassigned. Additionally, couriers can also request reassignment through
第 1 步：收集可重新分配的订单。对于系统发起的情况，通过一个在线算法监控骑手的配送过程，识别出值得重新分配的订单。具体而言，我们每分钟运行路径规划（RP）算法来估计骑手在完成所有已分配订单情况下的配送顺序和距离，以及在剔除其中某一订单后的情况。通过比较剔除前后对骑手预估的配送过程，我们选择对配送效率最有利的订单作为需要重新分配的订单。此外，若骑手遭遇影响配送过程的异常事件，也可以通过我们的应用请求重新分配。
our app if they encounter abnormal incidents that negatively affect their delivery processes.
我们的应用中如果骑手遇到影响配送过程的异常事件，也可以请求重新分配。
Step 2: Finding appropriate couriers for the orders. Unlike our regular dispatching problem, the reassignment problem is a one-to-one assignment problem. The Hungarian algorithm Kuhn (1955) is utilized, and the objectives are the same as in regular dispatch.
第 2 步：为订单寻找合适的骑手。与常规调度问题不同，重新分配问题是一个一对一的匹配问题。采用匈牙利算法（Kuhn，1955），目标与常规调度中的目标相同。
Step 3 (skip for the reassignment initiated by the courier): Reach out to the courier currently handling the order through a pop-up prompt on our app to inquire if they agree to the reassignment. If they decline, we will halt the reassignment process.
步骤 3（由骑手发起的改派请跳过）：通过我们应用内的弹窗联系当前正在处理该订单的骑手，询问其是否同意改派。如果对方拒绝，我们将停止改派流程。
Step 4: Reach out to the courier who is considered as a more appropriate one for the reassigned order through our app to inquire if they are willing to take on. If accepted, we will complete the reassignment process. If declined, the reassignment process will be stopped.
步骤 4：通过我们应用联系被认为更适合接手改派订单的骑手，询问其是否愿意接单。如果接受，我们将完成改派流程；如果拒绝，改派流程将被终止。
Through reassignment, about 1 % 1 % 1%1 \% of orders will be completed by new couriers found through reassignment. The A / B A / B A//B\mathrm{A} / \mathrm{B} experiment shows that the delivery intervals for these reassigned orders are on average shortened by over 1 minute.
通过改派，大约 1 % 1 % 1%1 \% 的订单会由通过改派找到的新骑手完成。 A / B A / B A//B\mathrm{A} / \mathrm{B} 实验显示，这些被改派订单的配送时长平均缩短了超过 1 分钟。

Benefits  收益

The dispatch system has brought great benefits, including business development and financial benefits for the company, optimizing courier, consumer, and merchant experience, improving environmental impact, and helping respond to the COVID-19 pandemic.
该调度系统带来了巨大的益处，包括公司的业务发展和财务收益，优化了骑手、消费者和商家的体验，改善了环境影响，并帮助应对新冠疫情。

Business Development  业务发展

Since the company was listed in Hong Kong in 2018, Meituan, as one of the world’s largest online and on-demand delivery platforms, has grown greatly. Compared to 2019, the number of cities covered increased by 40 % 40 % 40%40 \% and the number of registered users increased by 60.76 % 60.76 % 60.76%60.76 \%. Meanwhile, the number of merchants on the platform increased by 55.93 % 55.93 % 55.93%55.93 \%, and the number of couriers serving the platform to deliver food increased by 32.08 % 32.08 % 32.08%32.08 \%. The daily average number of transactions in peak seasons increased by 100 % 100 % 100%100 \% to about 60 million.
自 2018 年公司在香港上市以来，美团作为全球最大的线上即时配送平台之一，规模大幅增长。与 2019 年相比，覆盖城市数量增加了 40 % 40 % 40%40 \% ，注册用户数量增加了 60.76 % 60.76 % 60.76%60.76 \% 。与此同时，平台上的商家数量增加了 55.93 % 55.93 % 55.93%55.93 \% ，用于配送餐食的骑手数量增加了 32.08 % 32.08 % 32.08%32.08 \% 。高峰季节的日均交易次数增加了 100 % 100 % 100%100 \% ，达到约 6000 万。
As the number of transactions increases, the dispatch problem becomes more challenging, especially in peak hours when about 20 million orders could be assigned to about 5 million couriers.
随着交易量的增加，调度问题变得更加具有挑战性，尤其是在高峰时段，大约 2000 万笔订单可能需要分配给大约 500 万名骑手。

Courier and Consumer Experience
骑手和消费者体验

The dispatch system increased the efficiency of couriers and significantly improved the satisfaction of couriers, consumers, and merchants.
该调度系统提高了骑手的效率，并显著提升了骑手、消费者和商家的满意度。
For consumers, the time from placing an order to receiving the delivery decreased by 20.96 % 20.96 % 20.96%20.96 \% with the dispatch system deployment.
对于消费者，部署调度系统后，从下单到收货的时间减少了 20.96 % 20.96 % 20.96%20.96 \% 。
For couriers, the average number of daily delivered orders per full-time couriers has increased by more than 109 % 109 % 109%109 \% with the help of the dispatch system. In addition, because of the intelligent system, the order received by each courier is more smooth. Therefore, the couriers traveling distance per order before is about 2 km , and the distance after is about 1.5 km , reduced by about 0.5 km for delivering an order.
对于骑手，在调度系统的帮助下，全职骑手的日均配送订单数增加了超过 109 % 109 % 109%109 \% 。此外，由于智能系统的原因，每位骑手接单更加平滑。因此，骑手每单的行驶距离从之前约 2 公里，减少到约 1.5 公里，每单减少约 0.5 公里。
For merchants, the reduction in average delivery time per order is also good news. Besides, the time it takes for food to be picked up decreased by 16.0 % 16.0 % 16.0%16.0 \%. Therefore, the service provided to merchants is also becoming better.
对于商家而言，每单平均配送时间的减少也是个好消息。另外，取餐所需时间减少了 16.0 % 16.0 % 16.0%16.0 \% 。因此，向商家提供的服务也在不断改善。

As for the third item, the carbon footprint of an e-bike in China is about 16.5 g of CO2 per kilometer, and the detailed estimation steps of the carbon footprint of an e-bike are in Appendix. Thus, we obtain the final CO2 emission reduction result, 532 , 125 kg 532 , 125 kg 532,125kg532,125 \mathrm{~kg} (CO2 emissions reduction per day) = 0.5376 km / = 0.5376 km / =0.5376km//= 0.5376 \mathrm{~km} / order × 60 , 000 , 000 × 60 , 000 , 000 xx60,000,000\times 60,000,000 order × 0.0165 kg / km × 0.0165 kg / km xx0.0165kg//km\times 0.0165 \mathrm{~kg} / \mathrm{km}.
通过调度系统的应用，我们每天大约可以减少 532 , 125 kg 532 , 125 kg 532,125kg532,125 \mathrm{~kg} 的二氧化碳排放。计算公式如下：每天的二氧化碳减少量 = = == = 每单平均减少的配送距离 * 每天的订单数 * 电动车每公里的二氧化碳排放量。在上述公式中，第一项为 0.5375 公里。第二项约为 60 , 000 , 000 60 , 000 , 000 60,000,00060,000,000 。至于第三项，中国电动车的碳足迹约为每公里 16.5 克二氧化碳，电动车碳足迹的详细估算步骤见附录。因此，我们得到最终的二氧化碳减排结果， 532 , 125 kg 532 , 125 kg 532,125kg532,125 \mathrm{~kg} （每天的二氧化碳减排量） = 0.5376 km / = 0.5376 km / =0.5376km//= 0.5376 \mathrm{~km} / 订单 × 60 , 000 , 000 × 60 , 000 , 000 xx60,000,000\times 60,000,000 订单 × 0.0165 kg / km × 0.0165 kg / km xx0.0165kg//km\times 0.0165 \mathrm{~kg} / \mathrm{km} 。

Response to COVID-19  应对 COVID-19

The dispatch system helped the company respond quickly to the many complexities associated with the COVID-19 pandemic. Under the severe epidemic situation in many cities in China, the demand for food delivery has surged, however, the supply of couriers has dropped a lot. Thus, the supply and demand ratio has become extremely tight, and a considerable portion of the orders was canceled. By adapting the system flexibly, including losing “irresponsible refusal” and “higher incentives” for couriers, relaxing the consideration of punctuality, and transforming the objective to achieve the best completion rate, better experiences for consumers and couriers have been achieved in many cities where severe epidemics have occurred.
调度系统帮助公司快速应对与 COVID-19 大流行相关的诸多复杂情况。在中国许多城市疫情严重的情况下，外卖需求激增，但骑手供给大幅下降。因此，供需比例变得异常紧张，相当一部分订单被取消。通过灵活调整系统，包括取消“无责拒单”与对骑手实施“更高的激励”、放宽对准时性的考量并将目标转为实现最佳完成率，在许多发生严重疫情的城市中，消费者和骑手的体验得到了改善。

Extending the Use of the Dispatch System
扩展调度系统的使用

The vision of Meituan is to help people eat better, and live better. In this sense, the value of the dispatch system is even higher. It enables the thriving of other new business formats of the digital economy in Meituan, such as Meituan shopping, Meituan groceries, and Meituan drugs.
美团的愿景是让人们吃得更好、生活更好。从这个意义上讲，调度系统的价值更高。它使美团其他数字经济新业态得以蓬勃发展，例如美团买菜、美团闪购和美团买药。
And with the rapid development of the digital economy in recent years, real-time assignment problems becomes more and more common and fundamental in many industrial fields. The analytics and OR techniques in the dispatch system are not just limited to the scenarios of OA problems in food delivery. They are highly portable to other industrial scenarios inside or outside of Meituan, such as computational resource dispatching, and online advertisement displaying.
随着近年来数字经济的快速发展，实时指派问题在许多工业领域变得越来越普遍且基础。调度系统中的分析与运筹学技术不仅限于外卖场景下的接单指派问题（OA 问题）。这些技术具有很强的可移植性，可推广到美团内外的其他工业场景，例如计算资源调度和在线广告展示等。

The Calculation of the Carbon Footprint of Ebike
电动自行车碳足迹的计算

the carbon footprint of ebike ( 16.5 g / km ) = ( 16.5 g / km ) = (16.5g//km)=(16.5 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km})= manufacturing consumption ( 7 g / km ) + ( 7 g / km ) + (7g//km)+(7 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km})+ electricity consumption ( 3.2 g / km ) + ( 3.2 g / km ) + (3.2g//km)+(3.2 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km})+ food consumption ( 6.3 g / km ) ( 6.3 g / km ) (6.3g//km)(6.3 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km}).
电动自行车 ( 16.5 g / km ) = ( 16.5 g / km ) = (16.5g//km)=(16.5 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km})= 制造碳足迹 ( 7 g / km ) + ( 7 g / km ) + (7g//km)+(7 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km})+ 用电碳足迹 ( 3.2 g / km ) + ( 3.2 g / km ) + (3.2g//km)+(3.2 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km})+ 食品碳足迹 ( 6.3 g / km ) ( 6.3 g / km ) (6.3g//km)(6.3 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km}) 。
1.manufacturing consumption 7 g CO2 per km
1.制造消耗 每公里 7 克 CO2
The ECF (ECF 2011) estimates that an ebike has an average manufacturing carbon footprint of 134kg CO2. With a lifespan of 19 , 200 km 19 , 200 km 19,200km19,200 \mathrm{~km}, the manufacturing consumption of ebike can be calculated as 7 g / km = 134 kg / 19200 km 7 g / km = 134 kg / 19200 km 7g//km=134kg//19200km7 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km}=134 \mathrm{~kg} / 19200 \mathrm{~km}.
ECF（ECF 2011）估计电动自行车平均制造碳足迹为 134 公斤 CO2。寿命为 19 , 200 km 19 , 200 km 19,200km19,200 \mathrm{~km} 时，电动自行车的制造消耗可计算为 7 g / km = 134 kg / 19200 km 7 g / km = 134 kg / 19200 km 7g//km=134kg//19200km7 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{km}=134 \mathrm{~kg} / 19200 \mathrm{~km} 。
2.electricity consumption 3.2 g CO2 per km
2.用电消耗 每公里 3.2 克 CO2
According to Bosch’s ebike range calculator (Bosch-Ebike 2022), a city ebike with a 500 Wh battery will provide a range of 94 km under typical commuting conditions (assuming 22 km / h 22 km / h 22km//h22 \mathrm{~km} / \mathrm{h} average speed, mountain bike tires, “sports” assistance mode and 85 kg combined weight). Assuming a charging efficiency of 90 percent (not all the energy from the plug makes it into the battery), an ebike will require 5.9 Wh ( = 500 Wh / 94 km / 90 % ) 5.9 Wh ( = 500 Wh / 94 km / 90 % ) 5.9Wh(=500Wh//94km//90%)5.9 \mathrm{~Wh}(=500 \mathrm{~Wh} / 94 \mathrm{~km} / 90 \%) of electricity from the grid to travel each kilometer. Furthermore, in China, the carbon intensity of electricity in 2021 is at 0.549 g of CO2 per Wh of electricity (Statista 2022). Thus, electricity use is calculated as 3.2 g CO2 per km = 5.9 Wh × 0.549 g / Wh km = 5.9 Wh × 0.549 g / Wh km=5.9Whxx0.549g//Wh\mathrm{km}=5.9 \mathrm{~Wh} \times 0.549 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{Wh}.
根据博世的电动自行车续航计算器（Bosch‑Ebike 2022），一辆配备 500 Wh 电池的城市电动自行车在典型通勤条件下的续航为 94 公里（假设 22 km / h 22 km / h 22km//h22 \mathrm{~km} / \mathrm{h} 平均速度、山地自行车轮胎、“运动”辅助模式和 85 公斤的综合重量）。假设充电效率为 90%（并非插座提供的所有能量都进入电池），电动自行车每行驶一公里将需要从电网获取 5.9 Wh ( = 500 Wh / 94 km / 90 % ) 5.9 Wh ( = 500 Wh / 94 km / 90 % ) 5.9Wh(=500Wh//94km//90%)5.9 \mathrm{~Wh}(=500 \mathrm{~Wh} / 94 \mathrm{~km} / 90 \%) 的电量。此外，在中国，2021 年电力的碳强度为每瓦时电力 0.549 克 CO2（Statista 2022）。因此，电力使用被计算为每 km = 5.9 Wh × 0.549 g / Wh km = 5.9 Wh × 0.549 g / Wh km=5.9Whxx0.549g//Wh\mathrm{km}=5.9 \mathrm{~Wh} \times 0.549 \mathrm{~g} / \mathrm{Wh} 产生 3.2 克 CO2。
3.food consumption 6.3 g CO2 per km
3. 食物消耗 每公里 6.3 克 CO2
The ECF (ECF 2011) assumes an average 70 kg cyclist on an ebike will burn only 4.4 extra calories per kilometer over no exercising time. Thus, with the ECF’s estimate for food production emissions (1.44g CO2 per calorie), we get 6.3 g CO2e per km ( = 4.4 = 4.4 =4.4=4.4 calories/kmx1.44CO2/calories) for food production.
ECF（ECF 2011）假设一名体重平均为 70 公斤、骑电动自行车的骑行者相比静止不运动每公里只会多消耗 4.4 卡路里。因此，按 ECF 对食物生产排放的估算（每卡路里 1.44 克 CO2），我们得到食物生产每公里 6.3 克 CO2e（ = 4.4 = 4.4 =4.4=4.4 卡路里/公里 x 1.44 CO2/卡路里）。

The multiperiod, multiobjective dispatch problem can be formulated as
多期、多目标调度问题可以表述为
optimize x t ∈ X t { ∑ t ∈ T F o ( W t , R t , x t ) } o ∈ O s.t. x t non-anticipative, t ∈ T  optimize  x t ∈ X t ∑ t ∈ T   F o W t , R t , x t o ∈ O  s.t.  x t  non-anticipative,  t ∈ T {:[" optimize "_(x_(t)inX_(t)){sum_(t in T)F^(o)(W_(t),R_(t),x_(t))}_(o in O)],[" s.t. "x_(t)" non-anticipative, "t in T]:}\begin{array}{r} \text { optimize }_{x_{t} \in X_{t}}\left\{\sum_{t \in T} F^{o}\left(W_{t}, R_{t}, x_{t}\right)\right\}_{o \in O} \\ \text { s.t. } x_{t} \text { non-anticipative, } t \in T \end{array}
where x t x t x_(t)x_{t} is non-anticipative which means that decisions made at time t t tt are based on the information we have at time t t tt. This assignment problem can be decomposed into a series of single-period, single objective deterministic assignment problems that are solved independently each time as we show below:
其中 x t x t x_(t)x_{t} 是非前瞻性的，这意味着在时间 t t tt 做出的决策基于我们在时间 t t tt 所拥有的信息。这个指派问题可以分解为一系列单期、单目标的确定性指派问题，每次独立求解，如下所示：

where R t , w ¯ R t , w ¯ R_(t, bar(w))R_{t, \bar{w}} is the set of available couriers at time t t tt for order combination w ¯ w ¯ bar(w)\bar{w}, and f t , w ¯ o , r f t , w ¯ o , r f_(t, bar(w))^(o,r)f_{t, \bar{w}}^{o, r} is the matching degree score of objective o o oo for dispatching order combination w ¯ w ¯ bar(w)\bar{w} to courier r r rr at time t t tt.
